```{r setup}
library(vembedr)
```

Embedding and customizing videos in a RMarkdown document might seem like complex task. It need not be.

Even the most complex and seemingly intractable issues can become clear with a well-founded framework:

```{r}
embed_url("https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_fZQQ7o16yQ") %>%
  use_start_time("1m32")
```
